data.title: Leona Lewis
data.meta_description: Leona Lewis has sold over 20 million records worldwide, and reached No.1 in over 35 countries with her …
data.text:
Leona Lewis has sold over 20 million records worldwide, and reached No.1 in over 35 countries with her hit single ‘Bleeding Love’.

A vocal powerhouse who is renowned for her vocal range and ability, Lewis is a 3-time GRAMMY Award nominee, 7 -time BRIT Award nominee, MTV VMA and World Music Award winner and has been nominated for MTV EMAs and Billboard Music Awards.

She became the first British female solo artist to top the US Billboard 200 album chart in more than 20 years, with her debut album Spirit.
